text: le’inanite kehayimanoti yanini be’irisu nuḥini yazezebetini denegegelachihu፡፡ yaninimi wedanite yaweredinewini yaninimi be’irisu ībirahīmini musanina ‘īsanimi yazezinibetini hayimanotini betikikili āk’wak’umu be’irisumi ātileyayu maletini (denegegini)፡፡ be’āgarīwochu layi ya wederisu yemitit’erachewi negeri kebedachewi፡፡ ālahi yemīshawini sewi wede’irisu (imineti) yimerit’ali፡፡ yemīmelesinimi sewi wederisu yimerali፡፡
